version_description:
- 17 chapter is out now! Hotel's on a verge of breakdown! Max is trying to overcome sudden emergencies, while Anna's wellbeing is under a threat! Update now!

- Share your opinion. We listen to every review to make our game more enjoyable.

- Family Hotel's story is just beginning. Every day we correct mistakes and make the game better for you to love.

- Сhapter 18 is out! Huge catastrophe changes into a massive triumph — Anna is finally getting a room! Max is starting to clean up the library, while Connor shares his plans! Update now!

- Share your opinion. We listen to every review to make our game more enjoyable.

- Family Hotel's story is just beginning. Every day we correct mistakes and make the game better for you to love.

Сhapter 20 is out! Anne is afraid for her mobile and is looking for it, but who could've guessed the results of her searching! Update now!

- Share your opinion. We listen to every review to make our game more enjoyable.

- Family Hotel's story is just beginning. Every day we correct mistakes and make the game better for you to love.
-  22nd chapter is available! Will Connor manage to steal back his painting from Anna unnoticed and turn himself in to the police? Why did Astro suddenly sound the alarm?

- Chapters 25 and 26 are out! Don't know how to decorate house interior and help a friend to find love at the same time? Just ask our heroes - they already know how to! Update now!

- Share your opinion. We listen to every review to make our game more enjoyable.

- Family Hotel's story is just beginning. Every day we correct mistakes and make the game better for you to love.

- Chapters 35 and 36 are available! How to take on the role of a lifeguard and to change into a hero from a victim? Update now!

- Share your opinion. We listen to every review to make our game more enjoyable.

- Family Hotel's story is just beginning. Every day we correct mistakes and make the game better for you to love.

- Chapters 40 and 41 are available! A disaster is threatening the hotel! Will the heroes be able to pull themselves together in the face of danger? Update now!

- Share your opinion. We listen to every review to make our game more enjoyable.

- Family Hotel's story is just beginning. Every day we correct mistakes and make the game better for you to love.

- Chapters 45 and 46 are available! The diary reveals old secrets, but life suggests one more: why did the new guest come to the hotel? Heroes have to find this out. Update now!

- Share your opinion. We listen to every review to make our game more enjoyable.

- Family Hotel's story is just beginning. Every day we correct mistakes and make the game better for you to love.
50th chapter is available! Max makes Emily an offer she can't refuse.
